member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ApiDescriptionExtensions.GetFriendlyId(System.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescription)
member.summary: Generates an URI-friendly ID for the . E.g. "Get-Values-id_name" instead of "GetValues/{id}?name={name}"
member.returns: The ID as a string.

member.name: T:Bookazon.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator
member.summary: This class will generate the samples for the help page.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Bookazon.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.ActualHttpMessageTypes
member.summary: Gets CLR types that are used as the content of or .

member.name: P:Bookazon.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.ActionSamples
member.summary: Gets the objects that are used directly as samples for certain actions.

member.name: P:Bookazon.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjects
member.summary: Gets the objects that are serialized as samples by the supported formatters.

member.name: P:Bookazon.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.returns: The samples keyed by media type.

member.summary: Gets the request or response body samples.
member.param: The value indicating whether the sample is for a request or for a response.
member.returns: The samples keyed by media type.

member.summary: Search for samples that are provided directly through .

member.summary: Gets the sample object that will be serialized by the formatters. First, it will look at the . If no sample object is found, it will try to create one using (which wraps an ) and other factories in .
member.returns: The sample object.

member.summary: This represents an image sample on the help page. There's a display template named ImageSample associated with this class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: This represents an invalid sample on the help page. There's a display template named InvalidSample associated with this class.

member.name: T:Bookazon.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator
member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:Bookazon.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.SampleDirection
member.summary: Indicates whether the sample is used for request or response

member.name: T:Bookazon.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.TextSample
member.summary: This represents a preformatted text sample on the help page. There's a display template named TextSample associated with this class.

member.summary: A custom that reads the API documentation from an XML documentation file.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The physical path to XML document.

member.name: T:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorController
member.summary: Controller for Authors and Author Services

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.Post(Bookazon.Models.Author.AuthorCreate)
member.summary: Create a new author and add them to the database.
member.returns: Allows a user to create a new author and save them to the database. If the author is successfully created, returns the message "Author successfully created."

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.Get
member.summary: Get all authors in the database.
member.returns: Returns the Author information for each author in the database with the AuthorId, FirstName and LastName.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.GetAuthorsByLast(System.String)
member.summary: Get authors by last name.
member.returns: Allows a user to search the database for authors by their last name, and returns all authors that match that criteria with their AuthorId, FirstName and LastName.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.GetAuthorsByFirst(System.String)
member.summary: Get authors by first name.
member.returns: Allows a user to search the database for authors by their first name, and returns all authors that match that criteria with their AuthorId, FirstName and LastName.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.GetAuthorByFull(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get authors by full name.
member.returns: Allows a user to do a more specific search of the database for authors by their first and last name, and returns all authors that match that criteria with their AuthorId, FirstName and LastName.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.getAuthorById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get author by their AuthorId.
member.returns: Allows a user to search the databse for an author by their AuthorId, and returns the author that matches the searched AuthorId if a match is found.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.Put(Bookazon.Models.Author.AuthorEdit)
member.summary: Edit an existing author.
member.returns: Allows a user to edit an existing author by that author's AuthorId. Each field must be confirmed or changed. Be sure follow the fields in the API to ensure you have all fields edited or remain unchanged. If successful, returns the message "Author successfully edited."

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete an existing author.
member.returns: Allows a user to delete an existing author by that author's AuthorId. If successful, returns the message "Author successfully deleted."

member.name: T:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorshipController
member.summary: Controller for Authorships and Authorship Services

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorshipController.GetAllAuthorships
member.summary: Get all authorships in the database.
member.returns: Returns the authorship information for each authorship in the database, listing the AuthorId and ProductId. Each authorship consists of an author and a product. Some products may have multiple authors.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorshipController.DeleteAuthorships(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete an existing authorship.
member.returns: Allows a user to delete an existing authorship by that authorship's Id. If successful, returns the message "Authorship successfully deleted."

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorshipController.PostAuthorship(Bookazon.Models.Authorship.AuthorshipCreate)
member.summary: Create a new authorship and add it to the database.
member.returns: Allows a user to link an Author to a Product through a joining table. You will need to create an Author and a Product before you can link them. If successful, returns the message "Authorship successfully added."

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.AuthorshipController.GetProductByAuthor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get all products by AuthorId.
member.returns: Returns all products linked to the entered AuthorId, returns the Authorship Id, AuthorId, and ProductId.

member.name: T:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.PublisherController
member.summary: Controller for Publishers and Publisher Services

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.PublisherController.Post(Bookazon.Models.Publisher.PublisherCreate)
member.summary: Create a new publisher and add it to the database.
member.returns: Allows a user to create a new publisher. To create a new product, an author and publisher must be created first. If the publisher is successfully created, returns the message "Publisher successfully created."

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.PublisherController.Put(Bookazon.Models.Publisher.PublisherUpdate)
member.summary: Update an existing publisher.
member.returns: Allows a user to edit an existing publisher by that publisher's PublisherId. Each field must be confirmed or changed. Be sure follow the fields in the API to ensure you have all fields edited or remain unchanged. If successful, returns the message "Publisher successfully edited."

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.PublisherController.Get
member.summary: Get all publishers from the database.
member.returns: Returns the publisher information for each publisher in the database with the PublisherId and publisher Name.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.PublisherController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get publisher by their PublisherId.
member.returns: Allows a user to search the databse for a publisher by their PublisherId, and returns the publisher that matches the searched PublisherId if a match is found.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.PublisherController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete publisher by their PublisherId.
member.returns: Allows a user to delete an existing publisher by that publisher's PublisherId. If successful, returns the message "Publisher successfully deleted."

member.name: T:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController
member.summary: Controller for Products and Product Services.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.Post(Bookazon.Models.Product.ProductCreate)
member.summary: Create a new product and add it to the database.
member.returns: Allows a user to create a new product. It will require entering in all of the required fields correctly. Before creating a product, be sure to create a Publisher and Author first in their respective tables. If the product is successfully created, returns the message "Product successfully created."

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.PostWithAuthorship(Bookazon.Models.Product.ProductCreate,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new product and add Authorship in one step.
member.returns: Allows a user to create a new product, and add the Authorship through the joining table, in one step. Before creating the product, be sure to create a Publisher and Author first in their respective tables. If the product is successfully created, returns the message "Product and Authorship successfully created."

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.GetAll
member.summary: Get all products.
member.returns: Returns the product information for each product in the database with the ProductId, Title, AuthorId, StarRating, and TypeOfGenre.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.GetByPriceRange(System.Decimal,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Get a range of products within a range of prices.
member.returns: Allows a user to search for products within a price range by setting the low-end and high-end limits. Returns all products that fit the criteria with their ProductId, Title, AuthorId, StarRating, and Price.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.GetByStarRatingRange(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Get a range of products within a range of star ratings.
member.returns: Allows a user to search for products within a star rating range by setting the low-end and high-end limits. Returns all products that fit the criteria with their ProductId, Title, AuthorId, StarRating, and Price.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.GetByTitle(System.String)
member.summary: Get a product by partial Title.
member.returns: Allows a user to search via a partial title (string) and each item in the database that matches the criteria will be returned with its ProductId, Title, AuthorId, StarRating and TypeOfGenre.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a product by its ProductId.
member.returns: Allows a user to search for a product via that product's ID, and returns the ProductID, Title, Description, AuthorId, StarRating, TypeOfFormat, TypeOfGenre, TypeOfAudience, PublisherId, PublishYear, Price, and TypeOfCondition if a match is found.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.GetByProductsByPublisherId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get all products from a publisher by PublisherId.
member.returns: Allows a user to search for products that are tied to one publisher. Returns all product that fit the criteria with their ProductId, Title, AuthorId, and StarRating.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.GetProductByStarRating(System.Double)
member.summary: Get a product by its StarRating.
member.returns: Allows a user to search for a product via that product's star rating, and returns the ProductID, Title, AuthorId, and StarRating if a match is found.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.GetProductByAudience(Bookazon.Data.Audience)
member.summary: Get a product by its TypeOfAudience.
member.returns: Allows a user to search for a product via that product's audience, and returns the ProductID, Title, AuthorId, and StarRating if a match is found.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.GetProductByGenre(Bookazon.Data.Genre)
member.summary: Get a product by its TypeOfGenre.
member.returns: Allows a user to search for a product via that product's genre, and returns the ProductID, Title, AuthorId, and StarRating if a match is found.

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.Put(Bookazon.Models.Product.ProductEdit)
member.summary: Edit an existing product.
member.returns: Allows a user to edit an existing product by that product's ProductId. Each field must be confirmed or changed. Be sure follow the fields in the API to ensure you have all fields edited or remain unchanged. If successful, returns the message "Product successfully edited."

member.name: M:Bookazon.WebAPI.Controllers.ProductController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete an existing product.
member.returns: Allows a user to delete an existing product by that product's ProductId. If successful, returns the message "Product successfully deleted."
